items.sentence: Tom wouldn\'t be too surprised if Mary didn\'t like the puppy he gave her.
When we started out in this business, many people said that we would fail.

Please attend the meeting in the second floor conference room at 2:30 p.m.
Since you have a sore throat and a fever, you should probably stay in bed.
The lower your self-esteem, the more you tend to focus on negative things.
Tom usually watches the weather report in the morning before leaving home.
Tom was escorted out of the building by security guards after being fired.
Tom worried about whether he had enough money to pay for such a nice meal.
I\'d think that the last thing you\'d want to do right now is talk to Tom.
